title: How to carrier unlock my LG stylo 5 - Quora

response.answer_text: If it’s carrier locked, you have to contact the carrier. They will advise if or what is needed and if it’s possible. If you are not under contract where you still owe payment, they should be able to unlock it.

You call the carrier and simply request the unlock code. If all the obligations have been met then they will send you the unlock code usually within a few days. The unlock services you pay for do the same thing, call the carrier. It is the carriers who have the keys.
